org.eclipse.emf.facet.efacet.core

Interface IFacetManagerFactory


  • public interface IFacetManagerFactory
    Factory for IFacetManager.
    Since:
    0.2
    Noimplement:
    This interface is not intended to be implemented by clients.
    Noextend:
    This interface is not intended to be extended by clients.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IFacetManagerFactory DEFAULT
      The singleton instance of the factory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods

      IFacetManager getOrCreateDefaultFacetManager(ResourceSet resourceSet)

      Deprecated. 
      Use getOrCreateDefaultFacetManager(ResourceSet) instead. The new method name is more understandable

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT

        static final IFacetManagerFactory DEFAULT
        The singleton instance of the factory.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrCreateFacetManager

        @Deprecated
IFacetManager getOrCreateFacetManager(Resource resource)
        Deprecated. Use getOrCreateDefaultFacetManagerWithSerializationResource(Resource) instead. The new method name is more understandable
        Create an IFacetManager.
        Parameters:
        resource - the Resource in which virtual EStructuralFeatures are serialized. Can be null if no EStructuralFeature provided a Facet are used.

      • getOrCreateDefaultFacetManagerWithSerializationResource

        IFacetManager getOrCreateDefaultFacetManagerWithSerializationResource(Resource resource)
        Get an existing IFacetManager or create a new one.
        Parameters:
        resource - the Resource in which virtual EStructuralFeatures are serialized. Can be null if no EStructuralFeature provided a Facet are used.
        Returns:
        The default IFacetManager associated to the Resource
        Since:
        1.0

      • getOrCreateFacetManager

        @Deprecated
IFacetManager getOrCreateFacetManager(ResourceSet resourceSet)
        Deprecated. Use getOrCreateDefaultFacetManager(ResourceSet) instead. The new method name is more understandable
        Create an IFacetManager.
        Parameters:
        resourceSet - the resourceSet which will be used to manage the facet models.

      • getOrCreateDefaultFacetManager

        IFacetManager getOrCreateDefaultFacetManager(ResourceSet resourceSet)
        Get an existing IFacetManager or create a new one.
        Parameters:
        resourceSet - the resourceSet which will be used to manage the facet models.
        Returns:
        The default IFacetManager associated to the ResourceSet
        Since:
        1.0

      • createFacetManagerWithSerializationResource

        IFacetManager createFacetManagerWithSerializationResource(Resource resource)
        Create a new IFacetManager.
        Parameters:
        resource - the Resource in which virtual EStructuralFeatures are serialized. Can be null if no EStructuralFeature provided a Facet are used.
        Since:
        1.0

      • createFacetManager

        IFacetManager createFacetManager(ResourceSet resourceSet)
        Create a new IFacetManager.
        Parameters:
        resourceSet - the resourceSet which will be used to manage the facet models.
        Since:
        1.0
